meanings.sent1: She was peeking through the curtains to see who was outside.
meanings.sent2: I caught my little brother peeking at his presents before Christmas.
meanings.sent3: The cat was peeking at the fish tank, hoping for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The sun was peeking through the clouds after a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The child was peeking around the corner, trying to surprise his friend.
